mapper.select: SELECT id,title,author,label,is_stick,allow_comment,is_draft,gmt_create,gmt_modified FROM blog_article ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.label,a.gmt_create,a.gmt_modified,a.author,a.content,a.allow_comment,a.is_stick,a.category_id, (SELECT count(1) FROM blog_comment c WHERE a.id = c.article_id) AS commentCount FROM blog_article a WHERE a.id = #{articleId};
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.gmt_create,'%Y%m') AS pubtime, COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM blog_article b GROUP BY pubtime order by pubtime desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_article (category_id, title,label, author,allow_comment,is_stick, is_draft,content) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{title},#{label}, #{author}, #{allowComment},#{isStick}, #{isDraft},#{content})
